Summary:
Pressing circle while hitting the enemy throws it back right after.
 42/40/38/36 SP cost
Pressing circle during the arte, within a certain distance, dashes behind the enemy. 20/18/16/14 SP cost
Pressing circle while hitting a guarding enemy reduces enemy guard value by 8. 24/21/18/15 SP cost
Can execute the arte even in mid-air, including extensions, 10/9/8/7 SP cost
Able to execute the arte right after guarding an attack. 20/18/16/14 SP cost
Able to execute the arte right after suffering damage. 50/47/44/41 SP cost
If pressing circle during the arte, does a front step right after. 10/9/8/7 SP cost
Pressing circle during the arte does a back step right after. 10/9/8/7 SP cost
Becomes able to follow the arte with normal attacks by pressing circle during the arte. 33/29/25/21 SP cost
Able to chain the arte with a different arte, only once. 33/27/24/21 SP cost
Very fast cast speed for a lower grade spell if used right after the spell. 80/76/72/68 SP cost
Pressing circle while hitting an enemy with the arte executes an extension arte. 18/16/14/12 SP cost. 5 TP cost
Pressing circle while *staggering* an enemy with the arte executes a mystic arte. 100/99/98/97 SP cost. 20 TP cost
